channel.title: Error with SRL
channel.description: Spotted a random... ******** FOUND TALKING RANDOM TEXT********: Talk-to Mysterious 0ld Man Found a box, solving... Question is: Which shape has number 6 [Runtime Error] : Exception: Access violation at address 02A93CC3 in module 'BoxPlugin.dll'. Read of address 65BFEAF4 in line 434 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\AntiRandoms.scar

item.title: Error with SRL
item.dc:creator: @bobert5696 bobert5696
item.description:
@bobert5696 wrote:

go to c:\program files\scar 2.03\ (or whever scar is located on your comp) go to the SRL folder, and find the folder named somthing like “move this to the plugins folder” open the folder, and copy the file inside into the plugins folder, restart SCAR, and all should work

Read full topic

item.title: Error with SRL
item.dc:creator: @PyRo1 PyRo.
item.description:
@PyRo1 wrote:

Spotted a random…
******** FOUND TALKING RANDOM TEXT********: Talk-to Mysterious 0ld Man
Found a box, solving…
Question is:
Which shape has number 6
[Runtime Error] : Exception: Access violation at address 02A93CC3 in module ‘BoxPlugin.dll’. Read of address 65BFEAF4 in line 434 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\AntiRandoms.scar

Read full topic
